searchFilters.apiJsonc:
[
    //author: SM, updated by Ness and KB
    {
        //author: SM
        "condition": "{{parameters.module === 'search'}}",
        "url": "/{{parsePath(parameters)}}/describe",
        "method": "GET",
        "response": {
            "temp": {
                "fields": "{{getSearchAttributes(body, parameters)}}"
            },
            "output": [
                {
                    "name": "queryBuilder",
                    "type": "select",
                    "label": "Query Builder",
                    "required": true,
                    "mappable": false,
                    "default": "builder",
                    "options": [
                        {
                            "label": "Builder",
                            "value": "builder",
                            "nested": [
                                {
                                    "name": "filter",
                                    "label": "Filter",
                                    "type": "filter",
                                    "options": {
                                        "store": "{{getRecordTypeFields(temp.fields, 'filter')}}",
                                        "operators": [
                                            {
                                                "label": "String",
                                                "options": [
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Equal to",
                                                        "value": "string::="
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not equal to",
                                                        "value": "string::<>"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Like",
                                                        "value": "string::LIKE"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Like (Case Insensitive)",
                                                        "value": "string::LIKE::CI"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not like",
                                                        "value": "string::NOT LIKE"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not like (Case Insensitive)",
                                                        "value": "string::NOT LIKE::CI"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "In (item1, item2, ...)",
                                                        "value": "string::IN"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not in (item1, item2, ...)",
                                                        "value": "string::NOT IN"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Is null",
                                                        "value": "string::IS NULL"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Is not null",
                                                        "value": "string::IS NOT NULL"
                                                    }
                                                ]
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "label": "Boolean",
                                                "options": [
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Equal to",
                                                        "value": "boolean::="
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not equal to",
                                                        "value": "boolean::<>"
                                                    }
                                                ]
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "label": "Number",
                                                "options": [

                                                    {

                                                    {

                                                    },
                                                    {

                                                        "value": "number::>"
                                                    },

                                                        "value": "number::>="
                                                    },
                                                    {

                                                    },

                                                    },

                                                    }
                                                ]
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "label": "Date (YYYY-MM-DD)",
                                                "options": [
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Equal to",

                                                    },
                                                    {

                                                ]
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "label": "Datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)",
                                                "options": [
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Equal to",
                                                        "value": "datetime::="
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not equal to",
                                                        "value": "datetime::<>"

                                                    },
                                                    {

                                                        "value": "datetime::>="
                                                    },
                                                    {

                                                        "value": "datetime::BETWEEN"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                        "label": "Not between (start, end)",
                                                        "value": "datetime::NOT BETWEEN"
                                                    },
                                                    {

                                                    },

                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "label": "Custom",
                            "value": "custom",
                            "nested": [
                                {
                                    "name": "q",
                                    "type": "text",
                                    "label": "Query String",
                                    "help": "Provide a valid query string according to the [Oracle documentation](https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/sales/faaps/ManageCollections.html)."
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                },

                    "name": "orderBy",
                    "type": "array",
                    "label": "Order By",
                    "spec": {
                        "type": "collection",
                        "label": "Order",
                        "spec": [
                            {
                                "name": "field",
                                "type": "select",
                                "label": "Field",
                                "required": true,
                                "options": "{{getRecordTypeFields(temp.fields, 'order')}}"
                            },
                            {
                                "name": "direction",
                                "type": "select",
                                "label": "Direction",
                                "default": "asc",
                                "options": [
                                    {
                                        "label": "Ascending",
                                        "value": "asc"
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": "Descending",
                                        "value": "desc"
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                },
                {
                    "name": "fields",
                    "type": "select",
                    "label": "Fields",
                    "multiple": true,
                    "help": "Select the fields to be returned. To improve performance, limit the amount of fields selected.",
                    "options": "{{getRecordTypeFields(temp.fields)}}",
                    "advanced": true
                }
            ]
        }

                    "type": "{{if(temp.hasDate,'select','hidden')}}",

                    "required": true,
                    "help": "Select the date field to trigger the module. It must be type `datetime`.",
                    "options": "{{getRecordTypeFields(temp.fields, 'datetime')}}"

                {

                    "label": "Label Field",
                    "required": true,
                    "help": "Select the label field to show if you choose where to start manually.",
                    "options": "{{getRecordTypeFields(temp.fields, 'label')}}"
                },
                {

                    "label": "Fields",
                    "multiple": true,
                    "help": "Select the fields to be returned. To improve performance, limit the amount of fields selected.",
                    "options": "{{getRecordTypeFields(temp.fields)}}"
                },
                {
                    "type": "{{if(temp.hasDate,'hidden', 'html')}}",
                    "label": "<div class=\"i-exception\"><div class=\"i-exception-description\">Please choose a different record type, this one does not contain the required 'datetime' parameter.</div></div>"
                }
            ]
        }
    }

expect.help: Enter the name of a child record to include its details in the response. Use a comma to separate multiple child records. For example, `Employees,Localizations`. Use the following format for nested children: `Child.NestedChild`. For example, `Employees.Managers`. If a nested child is provided, the relevant child will be processed implicitly - `Employees.Managers` is the same as `Employees,Employees.Managers`.

watchRecords.parametersJsonc:
[
    // RPC here is breaking epoch (bug in platform), the parameter must be hardcoded
    {
        "name": "recordTypeCategory",
        "label": "Record Type Category",
        "type": "select",
        "mappable": false,
        "required": true,
        "grouped": true,
        "help": "Available record types are based on your Oracle user rights at the time you created the connection. If your user rights have changed, go to your Connections page and click `Verify` next to your connection to update this list.",
        "options": "rpc://listRecordTypeCategories",
        "nested": "rpc://listRecordChildren?module=trigger"
    },
    {
        "help": "The maximum number of results to be worked with during one execution cycle.",
        "name": "limit",
        "type": "uinteger",
        "label": "Limit",
        "default": 2,
        "required": true
    }
]
